title: Episode 16 w/ David Banner
itunes:title: Episode 16 w/ David Banner
description:
N.O.R.E. and DJ EFN are the Drink Champs. In this episode the guys drink it up at Mississippi's own David Banner. The guys speak about Banner's recent run in with the law, the state of hip hop, activism and his vast career. As an added bonus Daz of DPG pops in to surprise the guys. --- Support this podcast: https://anchor.fm/drinkchamps/support

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
